cast.name: 伊安·布尔费尔德 Ian Burfield

introduction: Jacob Shaw, an ex-war photographer, thirsts for revenge for his young vibrant daughter on a gang in Central London. His social standing begs him to stay on the right side of the law, but his dark, long suppressed desires are fighting to become a reality and with the encouragement of April Harley, a psychopath war fanatic, sets his gruesome plans into motion. He sees red and with the help of an ex-military friend sets up the urban jungle conclusion for the enemy with an outstanding twist to ask the viewer "would you do the same?"
